item.title: Santiment: Ethereum Retail Traders Continue to Sell Off During ETH Price Surge
item.description: On August 13th, the cryptocurrency market analysis firm Santiment declared that "Ethereum is currently merely 6.4% away from its historical high of $4,891 on November 16, 2021. During Ethereum's upward movement, retail traders have been constantly offloading. "In history, price trends often go against the expectations of retail traders. On June 16, 2025, and July 30, extreme greed sentiment emerged, resulting in price corrections. Nevertheless, as the asset price continuously reaches new highs, traders have exhibited panic (FUD) and doubts.Currently, major stakeholders are accumulating Ethereum chips that retail traders are willing to sell, and the price shows almost no resistance from market sentiment, suggesting that Ethereum is likely to break through soon and set a new all-time high.

item.title: Yesterday's net inflow into the US Bitcoin Spot ETF was $65.9 million
item.description: On August 13th, according to Farside's monitoring, the net inflow into the US Bitcoin spot ETF yesterday was $65.9 million.

item.title: Yesterday's US Ethereum Spot ETF Net Inflow was $5.239 billion
item.description: On August 13th, as per Farside's monitoring, the net inflow into the US Ethereum ETF yesterday was $5.239 billion.

item.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founders: Bitmine and Sharplink Expected to Acquire a Combined $200-$400 Billion Worth of ETH by 2025
item.description: On August 13th, Vance Spencer, a co-founder of Framework Ventures, tweeted, saying, "It is anticipated that Bitmine and Sharplink will jointly acquire ETH worth between $200 billion and $400 billion in 2025. The majority of the ETH will be deployed in the on-chain lending market to attract stablecoins for leverage or yield farming. This will be the largest active capital injection in the history of DeFi."

item.title: Nomura: The Fed is expected to start cutting interest rates in September, with a total of 75 basis points expected over three cuts.
item.description: August 13th. Nomura's economist currently holds the view that due to a weak labor market and a reduction in inflation risks, the Fed will commence cutting interest rates in September. In a report, Nomura's economists stated that the Fed might reduce interest rates by 25 basis points during the September meeting, followed by another cut in December and the subsequent March. Although the median expectation of analysts is a 25-basis-point cut in the next three months, economists hold different views on the timing of the rate cuts. Nomura was previously among those institutions that anticipated that Fed officials would wait until later this year to loosen policy. (IG)

item.title: Cathie Wood: Expects Bitcoin Price to Exceed $1 Million Within 5 Years
item.description: On August 13th, Cathie Wood, the CEO of Ark Invest, stated in an interview with CoinDesk: "ARK's bullish forecast for Bitcoin still firmly anticipates it to exceed $1 million within five years. I believe that the more prominent driving force currently is its transformation into the entry point for institutions into digital assets and its role as a substitute for gold as a store of value, and our stance on this has remained unchanged entirely."ARK had predicted that Ethereum would evolve into an institutional protocol, and this prediction is now coming to fruition: Both Coinbase and Robinhood's L2 solutions are built upon Ethereum; the growth of stablecoins is primarily centered around the Ethereum network; in contrast to Bitcoin, Ethereum's treasury companies offer utility and staking functions; despite Ethereum having higher transaction costs and slower speeds, it provides a higher level of decentralization and security. The ARK ETF will hold a significant position in ETH and has al

item.title: In the last 24 hours, the total net network-wide liquidation amounted to $5.01 billion, with the primary liquidated position being a short.
item.description: August 13th. Based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, a total of $5.01 billion was liquidated across the entire network. Globally, 117,380 individuals were liquidated. The liquidation amount of long positions was $1.44 billion, and that of short positions was $3.57 billion.

item.title: Arthur Hayes Holds $1.46M Worth of ENA
item.description: On August 13th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), Arthur Hayes increased his position by $1.46 million in ENA. Since August 10th, he has accumulated a total of $11.258 million by purchasing ETH ecosystem tokens.As of now, ETH still holds the top position with a 66% share. ENA has surpassed PENDLE and become the second top asset, with a value of $1.746 million.

item.title: Binance will list BFUSD and launch a BFUSD Zero Fee Promotion.
item.description: On August 13th, as per official information, Binance is set to launch BFUSD on August 13th, 2025, at 22:00 (GMT + 8) and commence trading for the BFUSD/USDT pair. Furthermore, a zero fee promotion will be applicable for both BFUSD spot and margin trading pairs.

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch PublicAI (PUBLIC) on August 15th. Eligible users can use Alpha Points to claim the airdrop.
item.description: August 13th. According to official channels, Binance Alpha is set to become the inaugural platform to list PublicAI (PUBLIC) on August 15th. Once Alpha trading commences, eligible users can access the Alpha event page to receive an airdrop by utilizing Alpha Points. Further details will be disclosed at a later time.
